name: Pixel-Pac Adventure
description:
V1.5

Pixel-Pac Follows your mouse so that's how you move.

Blinky will Follow Pixel-Pac around. there are 50 dots in each level, collect all of them and you will instantly move to the next level. THIS IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT!!!! base game done and still working on  new modes . there are 20 unique levels with 15 randomly chosen  for the  game play. the last level will have100 dots to collect. once you finish the game a mode called Endless play will be unlocked which is exactly what it sounds like and that's  it for now so enjoy:).
